Title: The [Start test] Button on the last screen in the Currency.com card is located in the middle of the screen
Precondition: 1. The app is downloaded 2. Launch app
Steps: 1. Tap the "Currency.com" Card2. Open the last screen in the Currency.com card
actualResult: The [Start test] button is located in the middle of the screen
expectedResult: The [Start test] button is located in the bottom of the screen
